str2: Immediately, soon, at once. Adverb from euthus; directly, i.e. At once or soon.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A scale, a scaly substance thrown off from the body. From lepo; a flake.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To fall away (from), fall off. From apo and pipto; to fall off.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The eye; fig: the mind's eye. From optanomai; the eye; by implication, vision; figuratively, envy.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To look up, recover my sight. From ana and blepo; to look up; by implication, to recover sight.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
